title: Is there any meaning to our life and existence? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hello. There are two ways to answer this Universal Question. First is Scientifically and Second includes everything else that science cannot explain. I am going with the former. Firstly I would like to answer “existence” question. Science says we exist just because of happenstance.Some organic matter (may be from asteroids and meteors) coalesce to form long chains and finally DNA like structures.It took millions of years to form first single cell organism and then to multi-cellular beings like us.Check my answer on the question “meaning of life”.
